work.title: My work
work.description: A programmer passionate about commitment, he sees code as his purest form of expression. Each project is a new challenge to be explored.

About.title: Who I Am
About.description: Learn more about my skills and experiences

who.title: Who I Am
who.content: My name is Alysson Rafael, a technology enthusiast who is always looking for new challenges and learning opportunities. I hold a degree in Computer Science and currently work as a fullstack developer, combining a passion for code with constant professional growth.

experience.title: My Experiences
experience.content: I’ve been working in the tech field for several years, with experience as a freelancer and through personal projects that I constantly strive to improve. Today, I work as a junior fullstack developer, always focused on learning and evolving.

skills.title: What I Can Do
skills.content: I can develop anything from simple landing pages to complete inventory and sales management systems, as well as more complex mobile apps — always aiming to deliver the best quality possible.

Technologies.title: Technologies & Tools
Technologies.description: What technologies and tools do I master?
